content: That sounds like a great plan! I'll definitely use those tips to promote my Q&A session. I think I'll start by sharing a teaser post on my Instagram story, and then do a follow-up post a day before the Q&A session to remind everyone to submit their questions. I might also collaborate with a few other influencers in the skincare niche to reach a broader audience. Do you have any suggestions on how I can make the Q&A session more engaging and interactive? Maybe some ideas on how to use Instagram's built-in features, like Polls or Question Stickers?
